resources.string: Have you had blood in your cough during the last 2 weeks?
Have you ever had TB before?
Have you ever taken medication for TB that lasted or was supposed to last for 6/8 months?
For how many months did you take the treatment?
Does anyone in your family currently have TB?
Have you had fever in the last two weeks?
Have you had night sweats during the last 2 weeks?
Have you had unexplained weight loss during the last 2 weeks
